description:
Kazuho sees Renge gazing out the window one morning and asks her what she`s looking at. Renge points out that the plum flowers are blooming. Soon it will be spring, and time for Koshigaya Suguru`s graduation ceremony. When the day comes, the remaining students and their parents watch as Kazuho hands Suguru his graduation certificate. After the ceremony, the remaining students sing a song for him. Thus a new season begins at Asahigaoka Branch School.
Source: crunchyroll
